website_summaries.verdict: Featuring cartoony visuals, an array of characters, and a super-simple learning curve, this LEGO-themed Star Wars game is the best option for young players.
pros: Easy and forgiving family-friendly LEGO version of The Force Awakens
Play as fan favorites like BB-8, Chewbacca, and Captain Phasma
cons: Offers very little challenge for older players

customer_reviews.title: great game for 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5 and absolutely adores this game. He's pretty intelligent and intuitive so he can Master most of these things by himself. He does get hung up on different levels when he's not sure what to do and asks for my assistance but otherwise this entertains him for his allowed amount of time that he gets to play. We own most of the Lego games and this is one of his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: ShepherdMomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great game, even for a 3 and 5 year old!
customer_reviews.text: So here is what I would have liked to know when I purchased this.... My 3 and 5 year old can play it pretty well! I have had to jump in and “figure out” what the game wants you to do at times but they love the game. For reference, it’s easier game play than the lego marvel avengers game. That one frustrates them.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Plays Out Just Like The Movie
customer_reviews.text: When I first played this game I hadn't seen the movie, which really confused me when it came to the characters. I still had a lot of fun playing this, as I do with all the Lego video games. I eventually saw the movie and it made me realize I had to play this again. This game really does the movie justice. This is one of my favorite Lego video games out there.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: this is a beautiful and funny game
customer_reviews.text: This game defines charming. Holy cow, this is a beautiful and funny game. A must buy for Star Wars fan with a sense of humor, or a LEGO fan.
customer_reviews.author: Miken

customer_reviews.title: Great game, seller lacked customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product was 2 weeks late. I had reached out to the seller and it took them a week to get back to me, not the best customer service...but my son loves the game.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Thomas

customer_reviews.title: my 6 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: my son told Santa that he wanted this game and he was super excited when he opened on Christmas he couldn't believe that Santa got him the game he wanted he said now i really do think Santa is real! that is really awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea R

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My child enjoys it with his friends. They are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: norm

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this game! It has great visuals, colors, and the characters look awesome. Recommend for any Star Wars lover!
customer_reviews.author: SRogers

customer_reviews.title: Lids love the game. Ages 9 and 5.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love the game. Ages 9 and 5. A bit hard for the 5 year old to learn, but he caught on with the help of his oder sister. Mommy helped a bit too.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy and Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Not for all...
customer_reviews.text: Huge Star Wars fan, and I used to love the lego games. But this one felt clunky and odd to control. If I was a kid I'd probably enjoy this one more, but this one didn't really do it for me. Still love the franchise and I hope we get some true AAA SW games soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My son & I both love this game. Great puzzles thrown in there and levels that were just the right amount of challenging.
customer_reviews.author: KaylasPlaceReviews

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one month, but Amazon to the rescue
customer_reviews.text: My grandson played it a few times and it quit working. He has many XBox games and this is the only one to give problems. I appealed to Amazon and they are sending a replacement. Thank you, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Chalchiuhtlicue

customer_reviews.title: Dont by used game even it there in good condition... it lies
customer_reviews.text: When the game arrived and i put it in my xbox it would not download so i looked at the disk and there were these weird Mark's on the back of the desk that would not come off so now I'm stuck with this broken game that i was excited for
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: your child will love this game
customer_reviews.text: If your child loves Star Wars, your child will love this game.

customer_reviews.title: Lego games get better and better
customer_reviews.text: Lego games get better with each game. We love this game! My only disappointment was that we preordered but it didn't come with a Minifig as was the case by preordering other ways (not sure how).
customer_reviews.author: D. Avinger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Bought it for my son and he has played it through several times.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Clowers

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful game!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my nephews. They LOVED this game! It was a perfect game for their age (7). I would purchase this again!

customer_reviews.title: Lego Star Wars Game
customer_reviews.text: Bought for one of my grandsons for Christmas who is a big Star Wars and Lego fan. He loved the game and couldn't wait to play it.
customer_reviews.author: KSCB

customer_reviews.title: It is additive.  You want to keep playing it for hours.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very enjoyable game. It can be played over and over by all ages.

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Lego has a great sense of humor. My son loves these games especially the Star Wars themed ones!

customer_reviews.title: fun for all ages

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LITERALLY THE BEST GAME EVER, I WISH THE LAST JEDI HAD ONE TOO.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great game! My 5 year old and husband LOVE it!

customer_reviews.title: Good game

customer_reviews.title: ... has glitches but the game itself is alot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Still has glitches but the game itself is alot of fun!

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved this game
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved this game. It didn't seem like it took them very long to complete all the levels, but they have returned to the free play portions many times.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun with my son, and more than worth the cost.

customer_reviews.title: Really
customer_reviews.text: The game doesn’t even work I wasted my money on this
customer_reviews.author: Angelique Cole

customer_reviews.title: Beware you might have to buy the game more than once
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughters birthday as she love star wars and lego so I thought this would be a no brainer. She got an Xbox one s for Christmas and only had the one game that came with it which was a digital download. We put this disc in and installed the game she only played it twice, the disc was never removed from the console and now every time she tries to play it says she has to go to the Microsoft store and purchase the game. Looked at the disc and the surface is pristine no marks or blemishes on it. Very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: User001

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun game but not very long. You can 100% it over a week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my grandson and he chose it. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Kondo

customer_reviews.title: ... game and some of the cut scenes are very funny.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this game and some of the cut scenes are very funny.
customer_reviews.author: M Troupe

customer_reviews.title: One of our favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Challenging, fun and all around good time. Worth the money and time! Thoroughly enjoying!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Byard

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old nephew loves it. We played together for hours.
customer_reviews.author: John Icenogle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love star wars! This is a great addition to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Game doesn't get out of load screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought the game when it came out and have it to my son for his Birthday. He first played the game on 8/28/16. Now he tried to play it again today(2nd time). The disk is freezing right after the load game menu and no matter how many time it is reset it does the same thing. First ever problem with a Lego game but it is crazy frustrating. Have any other had this problem
customer_reviews.author: michael machen

customer_reviews.title: Luke - I am your Lego father
customer_reviews.text: Finally - a challenging game for my son and no blood splatter. I love the LEGO games and characters and have no second thoughts about my son playing these games. Of course we've seen the movie tie-in. The game is complex enough to keep him challenged but doesn't give my nightmares. Keep up the good work Lego!
customer_reviews.author: Ann G. Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Stellar :-)
customer_reviews.text: The sound effects are quite good, although the explosion sounds could have rocked the sub-woofer a bit more. The sounds of the aircrafts flying overhead are amazing. The blaster vibrations are dead-on. So far, I am a bit disappointed in the frequency of humor. It lacks that trademark Lego edge.
customer_reviews.author: NorwayNick

customer_reviews.title: I'm giving 5 stars only so this will. be ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving 5 stars only so this will.be seen. We received a ripoff copy of the Xbox one game. It had a sticker on it instead of being printed on the game. It didn't work. Don't buy from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Not what the picture showed...
customer_reviews.text: The one I got is not for Xbox One but, rather, 360. I'm returning it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Auer

customer_reviews.title: Got ripped off.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give lower than a 1 star I would. My son finally received his game and it's not even a real game. Someone took a blank CD and printed a CD sticker to look like the game. Super sad.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi M.

product_meta.title: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens
product_meta.description: Platform:Xbox One| Edition:StandardThe No. 1 LEGO videogame franchise triumphantly returns with a fun-filled, humorous journey based on the blockbuster Star Wars film. In LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens, players relive the epic action from the blockbuster film Star Wars: The Force Awakens, retold through the clever and witty LEGO lens. The game will also feature exclusive playable content that bridges the story gap between Star Wars Episode VI: Return of the Jedi and Star Wars: The Force Awakens. LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens also introduces Multi-Builds and Blaster Battles to the LEGO videogame universe. With Multi-Builds, use available LEGO bricks to open up new paths, then break them apart and re-build them again to open up another! And another! During Blaster Battles, use your surroundings as cover to stand against the First Order.
feature_bullets: The No. 1 LEGO videogame franchise triumphantly returns with a fun-filled, humorous journey based on the blockbuster Star Wars film.
LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens
LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens
